media.headline: deGrom's first strikeout of 2017
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: deGrom fans Inciarte for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Jacob deGrom whiffs Ender Inciarte for his first strikeout of the 2017 season in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Colon's first K of the season
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Colon fans Granderson for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Bartolo Colon gets former teammate Curtis Granderson to strike out swinging, notching his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Walker's diving play at second
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Walker lays out to make diving play
media.bigblurb: Neil Walker makes a fine diving stop to his left and fires to first base in time to rob Brandon Phillips of a hit

media.headline: Colon given standing ovation
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Colon gets cheered in Citi Field return
media.bigblurb: Fan favorite Bartolo Colon is given a loud reception in his return to Citi Field as he stepped into the batter's box for his first at-bat

media.headline: Bruce's solo homer
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Bruce slugs a solo home run to right-center
media.bigblurb: Jay Bruce launches his first home run of the year off the top of the wall in right-center field, giving the Mets a 1-0 lead in the 5th

media.headline: Reyes throws out Garcia
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Reyes throws out Garcia at first on review
media.bigblurb: Adonis Garcia reaches first base after a strong throw from Jose Reyes and the Mets challenge the call in the 5th inning

media.headline: Garcia's RBI double
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Garcia laces RBI double to right
media.bigblurb: Adonis Garcia rips an RBI double over the head of Jay Bruce in right field, tying the game at 1 in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Blevins escapes bases-loaded jam
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Blevins induces ground out to escape jam
media.bigblurb: Jerry Blevins gets Ender Inciarte to ground out to first to escape a bases-loaded jam, ending the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Cabrera's smooth play at short
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Cabrera makes nifty pick and throw
media.bigblurb: Asdrubal Cabrera makes a nifty sliding pick and spins to make a strong throw to get Kurt Suzuki at first base

media.headline: Walker turns double play in 11th
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Walker turns two to escape jam in 11th
media.bigblurb: Neil Walker flips the ball to second base to start a 4-6-3 double play, escaping a jam with runners on the corners in the 11th inning

media.headline: Kemp's two-run double in 12th
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Kemp lines two-run double to left
media.bigblurb: Matt Kemp lines a two-run double to left field to give the Braves a 3-1 lead in the top of the 12th inning, his third double of the game

media.headline: Johnson K's Duda to seal win
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Johnson fans Duda to lock down the win
media.bigblurb: Jim Johnson whiffs Lucas Duda to earn the win and seal the Braves' first win of the season in 12 innings

media.headline: Peterson's leaping catch
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Peterson makes a leaping catch at third
media.bigblurb: Jace Peterson makes a leaping catch at third base on a sharp liner hit by Neil Walker in the bottom of the 12th inning

media.headline: Ramirez K's Kelly in 10th
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Ramirez fans Kelly to end 10th
media.bigblurb: Jose Ramirez gets Ty Kelly swinging to end the bottom of the 10th inning, stranding runners on first and second

media.headline: Walker starts 4-6-3 double play
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Walker flips to second to start double play
media.bigblurb: Neil Walker flips the ball to second base to start a 4-6-3 double play in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Phillips turns two in the 9th
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Phillips turns double play in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Brandon Phillips fields a weak grounder, steps on the bag at second and fires to first to complete the double play in the 9th inning

media.headline: Colon fans six in six innings
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Colon fans six in return to Citi Field
media.bigblurb: Bartolo Colon strikes out six in six innings against his former team, allowing just one run on two hits and one walk vs. the Mets

media.headline: Markakis triples to right-center
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Markakis triple to right-center field
media.bigblurb: Nick Markakis ropes a triple to the gap in right-center field in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: deGrom fans six in six scoreless
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: deGrom K's six in six innings in 2017 debut
media.bigblurb: Jacob deGrom fans six in six scoreless innings, allowing just two hits and one walk in his season debut vs. the Braves

media.headline: Colon keeps bat after groundout
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Colon carries bat all the way to dugout
media.bigblurb: Bartolo Colon exchanges a smile with Jacob deGrom after Colon carries his bat with him all the way back to the dugout after a groundout

media.headline: Salas K's Phillips in 8th
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Salas fans Phillips to escape trouble
media.bigblurb: Fernando Salas gets Brandon Phillips swinging to end the top of the 8th inning, stranding runners on first and second

media.headline: Collins on loss to Braves
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Collins on loss, return of Colon
media.bigblurb: Mets manager Terry Collins discusses the return of Bartolo Colon to New York and his team's loss to the Braves in extra innings

media.headline: Snitker on win over Mets
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Snitker on Colon, Kemp's game-winning hit
media.bigblurb: Braves manager Brian Snitker discusses Bartolo Colon's great outing and Matt Kemp's clutch hit in the team's win over the Mets

media.headline: Kemp on win, Colon's outing
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Kemp reacts to go-ahead hit in extras
media.bigblurb: Braves outfielder Matt Kemp discusses his clutch 12th-inning hit and Bartolo Colon's impressive outing in the team's win over the Mets

media.headline: Must C: Colon's memorable return
media.blurb: Must C Colon: Bartolo warmly greeted in New York
media.bigblurb: Braves pitcher Bartolo Colon enjoys a momentous return to Citi Field where former teammates and fans salute 'Big Sexy'

media.headline: Colon on ovation from Mets fans
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Colon on receiving ovation in return to NY
media.bigblurb: Braves pitcher Bartolo Colon talks about being warmly greeted from Mets fans and his appreciation for the reception

media.headline: Recap: ATL 3, NYM 1
media.blurb: 4/5/16: Kemp lifts Braves to extra-innings win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Matt Kemp hit a two-run double in the 12th inning to lead the Braves to an extra-innings victory over the Mets

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: ATL@NYM
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: ATL@NYM
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: ATL@NYM

media.headline: Bruce provides pop for Mets
media.blurb: ATL@NYM: Bruce hits homer, double, single in loss
media.bigblurb: Jay Bruce goes 3 for 5 with a solo home run, double and a single in a loss to the Braves on Wednesday
